item.description:
Join your Sitz hiking buddies for a Sunday morning hike through the Blue Hills in Milton!

 We will leave the parking lot at the Trailside Museum at 9:00am sharp, hike up to Eliot Tower and then follow the Skyline Trail over a number of hills, all offering great views of Boston and the adjoining towns. We’ll hike for 3-3.5 hours ending at the parking lot.

* Bring ~ one liter of water and snacks to eat on the way.

* Good shoes and appropriate attire are required.

* This hike will involve a number of hills so you should be in reasonably good shape and health. Rain cancels.

If interested, we can then eat lunch locally or you can head off to your Father’s Day activities.

 

Questions?

Event host: Larry Fava

email: mityfineone@comcast.net
item.how_to_find_us: we will meet at the Trailside Museum at 9am sharp!
item.name: Blue Hills Hike
